verification.prompt: Given that 'Dominos Pizza' refers specifically to the financial institution based in Sri Lanka, please evaluate the following social media post to determine if it is discussing this company. Reply with 'yes' if it is about Dominos Pizza Sri Lanka and 'no' otherwise.

Given that 'Pizza Hut' refers specifically to the financial institution based in Sri Lanka, please evaluate the following social media post to determine if it is discussing this company. Reply with 'yes' if it is about Pizza Hut Sri Lanka and 'no' otherwise.

Given that 'Popeyes' refers specifically to the financial institution based in Sri Lanka, please evaluate the following social media post to determine if it is discussing this company. Reply with 'yes' if it is about Popeyes Sri Lanka and 'no' otherwise.

Given that 'KFC' refers specifically to the financial institution based in Sri Lanka, please evaluate the following social media post to determine if it is discussing this company. Reply with 'yes' if it is about KFC Sri Lanka and 'no' otherwise.

Given that 'Dinemore' refers specifically to the financial institution based in Sri Lanka, please evaluate the following social media post to determine if it is discussing this company. Reply with 'yes' if it is about Dinemore Sri Lanka and 'no' otherwise.

recommendation.facebook:
Client: ##brands##
 Competitors: ##competitors## 
 Please do an analysis of ##brands## facebook posts vs. the ##competitors##, and give the ##brands## an analysis and recommendations to perform better than the ##competitors##, in point form. Note that each post had very good images and videos attached. Please make sure you include what the ##brands## did well and not-so-well, and what the ##competitors## did well and not-so-well, in the analysis, and provide the recommendations only for the ##brands##. Please return your analysis well formatted with HTML tags.

bahavior.facebook:
Client: ##brands##
 Competitors: ##competitors## 
 Please analyze these Facebook posts of  ##competitors## that received high engagement. Give us a customer behaviour and preference analysis for those competitors based on the engagements in comparison with its brands. Please return your analysis well formatted with HTML tags.

sltDataCategorizationPrompt:
give me the aspect base sentiment for given text. the text is $text$. Valid asspects are 
Menu, Taste & Quality, Pricing, Delivery Service, Dine-In Experience, Order Accuracy, Customer Support, Hygiene & Cleanliness, Promotions & Offers, Online Ordering, Mobile App, Packaging, Staff Service, Wait Time, Outlet Environment, Food Variety, Portion Size, Complaints & Issues, Brand Reputation, New Product Launches
Find the most relevant aspect from the given aspect list, for the given text. sentiment should be one of neutral,negative,positive. return the response with most suitable aspect and related sentiment as a JSON format. object key is equal to aspect and its value shoud be sentiment {relatedAspect:sentiment}. if there is no relevent aspect found for the text return null
